definition: various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: In end of July, there's the Malibu Art Festival, which has a bit of everything.
sentences.chinese: 在七月底，則是馬利布藝術節，有很多可看的東西。

sentences.english: During the Festival of Arts, I went to see a Beijing opera put up by a Shanghai troupe.
sentences.chinese: 藝術節的時候，我看了一出由上海某劇團演的京戲。

sentences.english: His newest creation was exhibited on West India Quay's Festival in London.
sentences.chinese: 他的最新創作上展出西印度碼頭的藝術節在倫敦舉行。

sentences.english: drama Experiment works participated in the art festival at home and abroad with theatre festival.
sentences.chinese: 多個作品曾參與國內外多個藝術節與戲劇節。

sentences.english: Icebreaker ‘Krasin’ is a museum that could be visited during the Festival of Modern art held in a traditional museum.
sentences.chinese: 人們可以在現代藝術節期間參觀破冰船“卡拉辛”號。

sentences.english: It's one of the biggest annual theatre and arts festivals in the world.
sentences.chinese: 這個藝術節是全球最大的舞臺藝術節之一。

sentences.english: It's one of the biggest annual theatre and arts festivals in the world.
sentences.chinese: 這個藝術節是全球最大的舞臺藝術節之一。

sentences.english: People wearing gorgeous traditional costumes, participate in the opening ceremony of the Bali Arts Festival.
sentences.chinese: 人們身着絢爛的傳統服裝，參加巴釐藝術節開幕儀式。

sentences.english: In autumn prime, we usher the 4th English Festival.
sentences.chinese: 在這秋高氣爽的季節，我們迎來了第四屆英語藝術節。

sentences.english: It's called "How Weird Street Festival". It's May 1st.
sentences.chinese: 是“古怪街頭藝術節”，在五月一號。

sentences.english: In the bloomy spring season, we have welcomed the ninth session of English art festival.
sentences.chinese: 在春暖花開的季節裏，我們迎來了第九屆英語藝術節。

sentences.english: CD Recoding Project of Kun-Due Art Festival Musical Program.
sentences.chinese: 關渡藝術節音樂性節目錄音工程暨製作CD計劃。

sentences.english: Why do local acts go off at Arts Fests?
sentences.chinese: 藝術節本地節目何以失常？

sentences.english: If you do a good job, you can put on the play at the school theater festival.
sentences.chinese: 如果你們演得好，還可以在學校藝術節上公演。

sentences.english: Qijiang farmers Graphic Arts Festival "Farmers live Contest prints."
sentences.chinese: 綦江農民版畫藝術節的“農民版畫現場創作大賽”。

sentences.english: The artists are seeking a couple who have a baby due exactly during the period of the festival.
sentences.chinese: 這倆藝術家正在尋找正好在藝術節期間生孩子的夫婦。

definition: to organize/to host (a conference or sports event)
